name: iWeb
tagline: eCommerce Agency and Official Magento Partners
description:
iWeb are a full-service eCommerce agency, Magento Professional Solution Partner with over 23 years experience designing and developing eCommerce websites that sell.
From B2C to B2B to B2C2B, we’ve got great experience working with clients from all sectors, including JCB, British Heart Foundation and Tile Giant.
Our friendly team of accredited Magento experts have the perfect combination of creative and technical skills, building complex websites that look beautiful and perform brilliantly.
Our Ethos 
We thrive on our customers'​ success. If we make their website a success they reward us with a continued relationship. We derive low value from build-and-forget projects. We work in partnership with our clients, forming an extension to their existing team rather than having a problem outsourced to us.
We have multiple client relationships that are still strong after 10+ years of working together. They appreciate our honesty, open lines of communication and down to earth approach. If you would like an honest conversation about taking your project forward, we’d love to hear from you.
Our Services
Magento development
Web design
Product Information Management
Mobile websites
Hosting
Ongoing support and maintenance
Digital marketing - SEO, Paid, Email & Social
